name: Arctovish
description: Though it's able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
abilities.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
